title: Why do you hate a Champion?
body:
Hey all,

What is the one reason you hate a champ? Pick a champ and tell us. :)

___

http://lkimg.zamimg.com/shared/guides/221017/images/Yasuo%20W%20Ability%201.png

Mine is Yasuo. Tilts me off my chair when I see that in a game. I can deal with everything else about him but that.

replies.body:
Who ever would have guessed this would be a yasuo thread?

Just reposition and his windwall is no longer a problem.
More often than not, the reason people hate any champion is they don't really understand how they work, and in turn don't understand how to play against them.

If you hate yasuo, learn how to play him and learn his weaknesses, then exploit them when playing against him.

I'm pretty sure most of the abilities in the game count as projectiles, along with a whole class based on AAing in projectile form.

You're telling ALL of them, to Reposition because one champion used a basic ability that nullifies ALL of the damage and effect their projectiles did for 4 seconds.

Also taking into consideration the map layout and the width of the wall(which at later levels is almost as wide as kathus wall) makes the ONLY way to reposition that is viable so that you affect people on the other side being to walk through the wall. Which for most people that use projectiles means melting, and instant death from whoever they're aiming at.

Also the wall is actually wider than it appears so people standing inside of it are safe from any and all projectiles.


Yeah Yasuo can do whatever the fuck he wants but the wind wall is getting it's hate for a reason.

>You're telling ALL of them, to Reposition because one champion used a basic ability that nullifies ALL of the damage and effect their projectiles did for 4 seconds.

yes, that's exactly what I'm saying.
I don't hate Yasuo as much as I hate 95% of people that play him.

I don't think  you grasped the concept I was going for. This is not a yasuo thread. I simply want people to say a champ they hate and the reason they do. It just so happens the champ I hate is yasuo, specifically his wind wall. I understand how he works; I know how to play against him. Hence, 
> I can deal with everything else about him but that.

But the fact remains, I still hate him.   :)

I personally would hate wind wall a lot less if it was just either a wall that blocked projectiles or much preferably, it just swept away projectiles as a one time thing.  Currently, it'll just eat projectiles for a minute and once cast, swipe away a bunch that are right there.

his wind wall im ok with.

His lifesteal/damage im not.

{{champion:114}} Good luck outdueling her-i always lose lane against her

{{champion:99}}  Need i say more?

{{champion:75}} deny him farm, leave him alone to gank a lane, voila hes going from 0/4 to 10/4

{{champion:26}} u can have 2 ga's with this guy.
{{champion:53}}  Just having him around tilts me.
{{champion:27}} Because everyone who plays him is usually a douch, not all, but most
